abstract: Lever House will close its garden courtyard and arcade to the public on Sunday, as it has once a year since 1953 to protect its property rights. Shubert Alley, Rockefeller Plaza and College Walk at Columbia University also close annually for part of a day.

headline.main: At Lever House, Public Is Always Welcome. Except This Sunday.
